data.text: I muli di Laangi Sabad, luada loo di laangi tabu, Mary mai Magdala, mo Mary dela i golo, gaa hula belee mmada taalunga.
Di madagoaa hua deelaa, gei tenua gu ngalungalua, tangada di langi o Dimaadua gu haneia i di langi, ga haga daga gi daha di hadu, gaa noho i nonua.
Mee e madamada huoloo gadoo be di ila, ono gahu e kene gadoo be ‘snow’.
Digau hagaloohi gu uli nadau gai huoloo, gu polepole i nadau mmaadagu, guu hai be digau ne mmade.
Tangada di langi ga helekai gi nia ahina aalaa, “Goolua hudee mmaadagu. Au e iloo bolo goolua e halahala a Jesus dela ne daudau i di loobuu.
Mee gu hagalee i ginei, gu haga mouli aga be ana helekai. Lloomoi mmada gi di gowaa nogo moe iei Mee.

Hula hagalimalima, hagi anga ina gi ana dama agoago boloo, ‘Mee gu haga mouli aga, guu hana gi Galilee i godou mua, deelaa di gowaa ga gidee goodou a Mee!’ Gi langahia agu helekai ala ne hagi adu gi goolua!”
Meemaa ga hagatanga haga llebullebu, gu mmaadagu gei gu tenetene huoloo, gaa llele ga haga iloo gi ana dama agoago.
Di madagoaa deelaa, Jesus ga duu adu i mua meemaa ga helekai, “Di aumaalia gi madalia goolua.” Meemaa ga lloomoi gi Mee, gaa kumi adu nia wae o maa, ga daumaha ang gi Mee.
Jesus ga helekai, “Goolua hudee mmaadagu, hula haga iloo ina gi ogu duaahina bolo gii hula gi Galilee, deelaa di gowaa ga gidee ginaadou Au.”

Di madagoaa nia ahina ala ne hula ne haga iloo, hunu daangada i digau dauwa ala nogo hagaloohi taalunga deelaa, gaa hula gi di waahale, ga hagi anga gi nia dagi hai mee dabu nia mee huogodoo ala ne hai.
Nia dagi hai mee dabu ga heetugi gi nia dagi mmaadua ga haga noho di nadau mee dela e hai. Digaula gaa wanga di nadau hulu bahihadu damana gi digau dauwa,
ga helekai, “Goodou helekai bolo ana dama agoago ne lloomoi boo, ga gaiaa tuaidina o Maa, gei goodou nogo kii.
Maa di gobinaa ga longono ia, gei gimaadou ga haga modongoohia laa gi mee bolo goodou digi hala. Goodou hudee lliga i dahi mee.”
Digau hagaloohi gaa kae nia bahihadu gaa hai be nnelekai ala ne hagi anga gi ginaadou. Di longo deenei guu dele i baahi digau o Jew, gaa dae mai loo gi dangi nei.
Nia dama agoago dilongoholu maa dahi ne hula gi di gonduu i Galilee dela ne hagi anga go Jesus gi digaula bolo gii hula ginai.28.16 Matthew 26.32; Mark 14.28
Di madagoaa hua dela ne gidee ginaadou a Mee, digaula ga daumaha ang gi Mee, gei hunu gau e manawa logo.
Jesus ga hanadu gi digaula, ga helekai, “Nia mogobuna huogodoo o di langi mo henuailala la gu dugu mai gi di Au.
Malaa, goodou hula gi nia daangada i nia henua huogodoo, heia digaula gii hai nia dama agoago ni aagu. Babdais ina digaula gi di ingoo o Tamana, Tama, mo di Hagataalunga Dabu.28.19 Nnegau 1.8
Agoago gi digaula gi daudalia nia mee huogodoo ala ne hagi adu gi goodou. Malaa, goodou gi iloo bolo Au e madalia goodou i nia madagoaa huogodoo, gaa dae loo gi di hagaodi o di madagoaa.”
